channel.title: Pking with range HELP ITS SERIOUS
channel.description:
okay well heres wats wrong...
my range in pking is screwed up -.-
i need help fast, this is wat happens, when u attack with for example... a whip, and u hit a 10
if u put on a bow/any ranging item, it will only hit 10's.... it hits watever ur last hit with melee is....
willing to pay $12 paypal if u help me
heres a video of it... i no, a video.. thats how desperate i m http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lfjIfYZEppQ[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 05, 2009, 09:56:37 pm[/size][hr]seriously nubs help meh

item.title: Pking with range HELP ITS SERIOUS
item.dc:creator: @Axed Axed
item.description:
@Axed wrote:

Change the code for it in client.java, it’s set to hit the same opponent with the same (hit).

Read full topic
item.source: Pking with range HELP ITS SERIOUS

item.title: Pking with range HELP ITS SERIOUS
item.dc:creator: @grimreaper61 grimreaper61
item.description:
@grimreaper61 wrote:

holy crap. Thats bad. I had something like this happen. Does it do it with npcs as well? If so it is probably what happened to mine. I was editing misc hits and forgot to close it off. Somehow range was hitting ridiculous hits.

Read full topic
